articles.title: India looks to rains, not just rates, to cool hot inflation
articles.description: As India faces a crippling surge in food and fuel prices, the policymakers will be counting mostly on this year's monsoon rains, not just interest rate hikes, to take inflationary pressure off the country's households and businesses.
